articles.description: SCOTTSDALE, Ariz. -- Though Zyhir Hope was one of the better two-way players in the 2023 Draft, clubs weren't sure exactly what to make of his signability. He seemed strongly committed to North Carolina, so the first two days and 10 rounds passed without him …

articles.author: Reice Shipley
articles.title: Mic’d up moment shows Saquon Barkley telling Nick Sirianni to ‘play the young guys’ instead of going for personal record - Awful Announcing
articles.description: The Eagles shared a video showing a mic'd up Saquon Barkley turning down the chance to break his own rushing yards record to "let the young guys play."
articles.content: On Sunday, Philadelphia Eagles star running back Saquon Barkley made his former team regret letting him go in free agency. But given the opportunity to break his own personal rushing yards record, Ba… [+1688 chars]
